Content:: The Roman Catholic Diocese of Bururi (Latin: Bururien(sis)) is a diocese located in the city of Bururi in the Ecclesiastical province of Bujumbura in Burundi. The Cathedral is the Cathédrale Christ Roi in Bururi. Coordinates: 3°56′50″S 29°38′00″E﻿ / ﻿3.9471°S 29.6334°E﻿ / -3.9471; 29.6334  This Burundi-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This article on a Roman Catholic diocese in Africa is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
